main event: A witness at Chaparosa Ranch saw an intense red, flashing object in the sky on November 21, 1965.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a plane but had a different shape and could maneuver unlike any aircraft., The witness observed the sky was mostly clear with some long scattered clouds., There was no sound coming from the object at any time., An aircraft from the direction of the object appeared to be chasing it after the sighting., The object vanished within minutes, leaving the aircraft to continue its flight.
sighted object: intense red flashing object in the sky
witness description: the witness was leaving a home on the ranch
